description:
A solution to relocate render jobs from the pCon.planner workstation to a separate rendering engine, which is located on a separate system.

The pCon.planner â€“ Batch Rendering Service is a solution to relocate render jobs from the pCon.planner workstation to a separate rendering engine, which is located on a separate system. By that the capacities of the pCon.planner workstation are not blocked by rendering and the user can continue their planning activities as usual and without limitations.
